scripts.db:generate: npx dotenv -- pnpm -r --filter database exec -- pnpm run db:generate
scripts.db:push: npx dotenv -- pnpm -r --filter database exec -- pnpm run db:push
scripts.db:migrate: npx dotenv -- pnpm -r --filter database exec -- prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:deploy: npx dotenv -- pnpm -r --filter database exec -- prisma migrate deploy
